_sText:
###########

Break 'n' Run 2

###########

Okay, This is a new style of gameplay for CSS (i think anyway)... i thought of the idea a few days ago, so this is my first attempt...

The idea is Left For Dead style CO-OP, but on a smaller scale, and not with zombies, with CT's...with guns lol. (so nothing like left for dead really...)

NOW THE IMPORTANT STUFF - PLEASE READ!!

*There are 4 T spawns and 12 CT's (so 4 player co-op)
*It was designed around having bots (very hard) as the CT's
*CT's start armed to the teeth, whilst the T's have a 10 second head start to go and find some guns/hide/run away/whatever...

HOW TO PLAY - READ THIS TOO! :) 

*Find a couple of mates (not very fun alone)
*Join T side - you will start with a pane of glass in front of you - THIS IS THE TRIGGER TO START THE GAME
*The glass has 200 HP - once its broken, you have 10 seconds to run into the room ahead and find some guns! 
*After 10 seconds, the wall holding back the CT's will break, and being bots (which they should be) will come and hunt you down! :)


There are various weapons/grenades located around the map, also a variety of routes to take for both teams.

QUESTIONS/COMMENTS/IDEAS all welcome! 

LET ME KNOW WHAT YOU THINK OF THE GAMEPLAY TYPE - il make some more maps for it if people want them :) 


Cheers! 


Gavin
